item.title: Git Note
item.description: Git de-bug bisect!!! git bisect start git bisect bad git bisect good [good commit] find it and fixed. use git bisect reset return the begin Add git 创建并添加ssh key git config --global user.name "leiheng" git config --global user.email "heng.lei@hpe.com" ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "heng.lei@hpe.com" 但是如果要在电脑上添加自己的github accout，refer this ssh-add error refer this final: git clone git@git-personal:leiheng\repo final: git clone git@github.com:leiheng\repo 配置了.gitignore但是并没有起作用 method: git rm --cached *.class git commit -m "add gitignore file" Good Habit 本地新建分支，然后merge到master上去，用master作为提pr的branch 开始写代码之前rebase代码 rebase before or after change does not matter, the point is, do not rebase branch which other guys or other mechine working on it.
